Text: Tells me i need disc7, where do i find it, need help plz
Installation requires entering a code that appears on the back of the manual and on the CD case. This code is not contained in the torrent. Can you help?
DONT WORK !!  Wats the entring code ??  Help please
ok i know how to find the keygen but im having troubles getting the inst. exe. to run. care to give me install directions?

After you Burn the Image to a dvd disc, ojpen the disc and the code you need to enter is in the folder marked Crack. Open it and there is an icon called rld-tw 7k. Click on it and then click on the regen button. it will give you the code you need. But after I installed it, it wants cd 7. and I dont know what to do then any one else know what to do????????
Has anyone managed to get this to work after installation? Keeps asking for the disk here too

Hey all, i got it!! Found this on another post of the same thing. Here's what you do:

Copy the cracked content located in the \Crack directory on the DVD to your installation\bin directory.

Good luck and enjoy the game now!

somone pls help this is doin my nut ive added the crack into the bin but its then saying it cannot locate language dll so i tried adding language dll from 1 of the other bin files then it comes up with more errors from the redist file i click ok on all of those errors then the game starts to load then i get another error and the game closes please can someone put me right thanx

find the target of the icon that starts the game = file tw2007.exe. Open the crack folder from the install folder and copy the tw2007.exe file from the crack folder to the target folder, overwrite. make a copy of the unzipped files onto a dvd and keep in the dvd drive while playing. good to go.
